issue.body:
There was a "clever" optimization that skipped sendrecv() handling when the transfer's pollset was empty. This happens for paused transfers, for example.

Unforunately, if the libcurl application never calls curl_multi_poll(), the pollset is and will aways remain empty, prevent the transfer from progressing.

Remove this "optimization" and always try send/receive where applicable.

refs #14898

body: Found the problem. Should be fixed by #14901.

Hi, @icing.
I've just checked 8.10 with #14901 applied on top - My PHP test and several PHP's full cURL tests, which there failing before are now passing just fine.
@vityank an advice though (unrelated to this issue): you want a call to **curl_multi_select** in there, as your example code will busy-loop and use 100% CPU during the entire transfer otherwise.
